title: Please fix the level of toxicity at Diamond V
body: Getting really sick of having 1-2 borderless players raging (and often also soft inting) in literally every single game, to the point I almost don't even want to play.

replies.body:
I don't think having a border means necessarily someone is bad at the game. Take me for example. I am borderless for now because I am leveling a new account cause my main account was unfairly banned but I was between p1 and d4 for 5 seasons now. But I do agree with your point, that players behaviour should be addressed and that the reporting/banning system should be reformed.

<removed by moderation>
why are you spamming a link to your post in every topic?
Because it's on topic and I don't consider spamming. It's just that the my previous post addresses this and proposes a solution.

It really wouldn't be appropriate if other players spammed links to other discussions, as it takes away from the discussion here.

If you have any questions about this moderation, feel free to reach out to us in the [Boards Discord](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification).
You get the border if you are diamond or higher and have honor 2+ or above at the end of the season. Not having a border does not mean that a player was or is likely to be toxic.

Was pretty sure you made a post on that topic earlier. They seemed somewhat related.

don't sweat it, will go past in a week.
